instructions: Image titled View Your Phone Number on an iPhone Step 1 1 Open your iPhone s . It's the app with gray cogs on one of your home screens. If you don t see it on your home screen, check in a folder called "Utilities." Image titled View Your Phone Number on an iPhone Step 2 2 Scroll down and tap . You ll see it in the fifth grouping of items. Image titled View Your Phone Number on an iPhone Step 3 3 View your phone number. Your number will be displayed at the top of the screen, along with its area/international code. Advertisement
